channel.title: Runescape Server Development - RuneGen
channel.description:
[ul]Hello all of you, i am not new around here at Mopar. I had left this private server community for quite some time now, never giving up on the empty taught of one day having a well known Runescape server. Pushing my money quite a bit, I have been saving to open a server for some while now. Not leaving this community behind, I decided to come back here and try to recruit some old friends for this new (huge, i hope) new project. So without further boring plain text, let's go to what's important shall we?
[center][img]http://img159.imageshack.us/img159/4395/16804751wg2.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][size=13pt]Status: Working on base Source(Server) and Client[/size][/b] [b][size=13pt]IRC: Our IRC is [b]#RuneGen[/b] at [b]irc.moparisthebest.com[/b][/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][size=15pt]The Project[/size][/b]:[/center] [b][u]Basic info[/u][/b]: This project is going to be supported by me, in the development of such work, i might get the people that give more effort to this project (Very likely to do so), to share a position as [b]Project Leader[/b]. Take this project with heart, I hope to make it grow big, as well as a fun environment to work with and play with.
[b][u]Funds[/u][/b]: Everything is going to be paid by me. No one is going to be asked for money whilst working on this project. The income get from the work they do, results from In-Game purchases such as Membership Subscriptions, such money will be distributed according to the function of each "employee".
[b][u]The Team[/u][/b]: Like all teams every member has an important job for the well being of the whole group of players, as well as the team mates involved. The job openings at the moment are quite big, knowing that you are likely to receive income. Remember that when you join the team, you will not be asked for any kind of money.
[center][b][size=15pt]Job Openings[/size][/b]:[/center][list] [li][b]Team Leader[/b]: Me (Marco Filipe) [b]Function[/b]: Granting the well being of the whole crew. Analyse all the other team members work, gather opinions and make sure that everything is ok. [b]Income[/b]: I will receive no income, therefore the money that i should get is for paying the WebServer and my team members.[/li] [/list]
[list][li][b]Lead Programmer[/b]: [i][b]Primadude[/b][/i] [b]Function[/b]: The lead programmer is the person above all involving coders. The requirement for this job is quite hard, this person or persons must have quality programming skills, also good leadership skills. Maintain the "Main Code" of the project, generating ideas into creation with the help of all other programmers. [b]Income[/b]: 20% of the total gain per month.[/li][/list]
[list][li][b]Lead Designer[/b]: [i]Open[/i] [b]Function[/b]: The lead designer organises the ideas of both Web Design, and concept. This person will be working with me, therefore I will be working on web design as well. [b]Income[/b]: 20% of the total gain per month[/li][/list]
[list][li][b]Programmer(s)[/b]: [i][b]Klorox WinterLife Primadude Project Territh[/b] [/i] [b]Function[/b]: Work with the lead programmer as well with fellow programmers to generate objects needed to the development of this project. [b]Income[/b]: 10 to 15% of the total gain per month[/li][/list]
[list][li][b]Content Manager[/b]: [i][b]The Reaper X[/b][/i] [b]Function[/b]: This person will be the [i]ideas guy[/i], meaning that this job is all about having ideas. In-Game events, such as Lottery, or Mini-Games. Will be working on the concept of such ideas with the programmers. [b]Income[/b]: 5 to 15% of the total gain per month[/li][/list]
[list][li][b]Beta Tester(s)[/b]: [i][b]legend the hero [/b] [/i] [i][b]Josh-Parkour91 [/b] [/i] [i]Open[/i] [b]Function[/b]: Person that will be testing everything on our project, from Clients, to new content, to just basic skills or emotes. [b]Income[/b]: 5 to 10% of the total gain per month[/li][/list]
[size=17pt]Contact: RuneGen@Gmail.com[/size] Best Regards.[/ul]

item.title: Runescape Server Development - RuneGen
item.dc:creator: @Null Null
item.description:
@Null wrote:

mr bob silab2:

Well, I defenitley don’t want to be part of this project as it seems like this Null guy is playing you. Oh, and a note, I saw in another post the mention of RuneRage and RageScape. I suggest that you do not use RageScape as it is the name of a server that has been around for more then 2 years and I know that the name is copyrighted. Just giving you a heads up on that one (I know one of the main programmers, he would get pissed is someone used that name). Well, goodluck anaway though.

Thanks but we already set a name.
Regarding you sad commentary “this Null guy” is not playing anyone, im glad to anounce that our work has started.

Read full topic
